Generates aesthetic posters from text prompts

Related repos

  • AI framework for generating aesthetic posters
  • Automates creation of textless media posters
  • Automates poster generation for Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby

  • Generates posters from scientific papers using agents
  • unifies style and subject in image generation, mix any look with any subject
